Title: Authorizes a plaintiff commencing an action alleging conduct constituting a sexual offense or a civil offense involving the transmission of HIV shall have the right to proceed anonymously
Summary: Authorizes a plaintiff commencing an action alleging conduct constituting a sexual offense or a civil offense involving the transmission of the human immunodeficiency virus shall have the right to proceed anonymously.
LawCode: Amd ยง50-b, Civ Rts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil rights law, in relation to the right to privacy in certain actions
